page.title: 15Margam Park The Passion Play
page.content: Every two years the Orangery Gardens at Margam Park provide the setting for the Afan Community Associations Passion Play, 'Behold the Man'. Written by Leo Arthurs and directed by Ina D. Jones it has established itself as an important and unique event in the South Wales calendar. Portraying the last week in the life of Christ, the play brings together actors from local Theatre groups and a crowd of 200 from the locality. Per- formed in the open, the June 1985 production saw the fiftieth performance, over 25,000 people having witnessed this profoundly moving and unique experience. For the first in 1985 due to extreme weather a perform- ance had to be postponed. Much of Associations profits are donated to local charities.
